an10.121:1.1.pli: “Sūriyassa, bhikkhave, udayato etaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ etaṁ pubbanimittaṁ, yadidaṁ—aruṇuggaṁ.
an10.121:1.1.en: “Mendicants, the dawn is the forerunner and precursor of the sunrise.

an10.121:1.2.pli: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ etaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ etaṁ pubbanimittaṁ, yadidaṁ—sammādiṭṭhi.
an10.121:1.2.en: In the same way right view is the forerunner and precursor of skillful qualities.

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 10.121
12. The Ceremony of Descent
Forerunner

sn56.37:1.1.pli: “Sūriyassa, bhikkhave, udayato etaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ etaṁ pubbanimittaṁ, yadidaṁ—aruṇuggaṁ.
sn56.37:1.1.en: “Mendicants, the dawn is the forerunner and precursor of the sunrise.

sn56.37:1.2.pli: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ abhisamayāya etaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ etaṁ pubbanimittaṁ, yadidaṁ—sammādiṭṭhi.
sn56.37:1.2.en: In the same way, right view is the forerunner and precursor of truly comprehending the four noble truths.

mlDocs.title:
Linked Discourses 56.37
4. In a Rosewood Forest
The Simile of the Sun (1st)

sn45.55:1.1.pli: “Sūriyassa, bhikkhave, udayato etaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ etaṁ pubbanimittaṁ, yadidaṁ—aruṇuggaṁ;
sn45.55:1.1.en: “Mendicants, the dawn is the forerunner and precursor of the sunrise.

sn45.55:1.2.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa uppādāya etaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ etaṁ pubbanimittaṁ, yadidaṁ—yonisomanasikārasampadā.
sn45.55:1.2.en: In the same way accomplishment in rational attention is the forerunner and precursor of the noble eightfold path for a mendicant.

sn45.56:1.2.en: In the same way good friendship is the forerunner and precursor of the noble eightfold path for a mendicant.

sn46.12:1.1.pli: “Sūriyassa, bhikkhave, udayato etaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ etaṁ pubbanimittaṁ, yadidaṁ—aruṇuggaṁ;
sn46.12:1.1.en: “Mendicants, the dawn is the forerunner and precursor of the sunrise.

sn46.12:1.2.pli: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ uppādāya etaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ etaṁ nimittaṁ, yadidaṁ—kalyāṇamittatā.
sn46.12:1.2.en: In the same way, for a mendicant good friendship is the forerunner and precursor of the arising of the seven awakening factors.
